overview: Recorded at the Credicard Hall in São Paulo, on 2 and 3 July 20102, the album celebrates the 30th anniversary of the group's career and is part of the 30 Years Tour.  Participate as special guests Symphony Orchestra Villa-Lobos, singer Milton Nascimento in the song "In Bailes da Vida", the singer Sandy Leah in the song "Silver Rain", Father Fabio de Melo in the song "Peace" (version "Heal The World" by Michael Jackson) and the band in Fresno song "Rock'n Roll Show"
title: Roupa Nova - 30 Anos Ao Vivo
